Hi guys,

Offering cPanel hosting with 60 % recurring discount with "cybermonday" for shared cPanel hosting across 6 locations

Every server has cPanel, CloudLinux, LiteSpeed, daily backups etc ( except UK )

[>> Order link << ](https://hostkoala.com/clients/order/forms/)

Standard plan - 1 GB Space 1 domain @ $2/year ( use "cybermonday" code )

Medium plan - 3 GB Space 3 domains @ $4/year ( use "cybermonday" code )

Premium plan - 5 GB Space unlimited domains @ $8/year ( use "cybermonday" code )

Open a support ticket and I'll bump the standard plan to 5 domains, medium to 10 domains !

I'm but a mere reseller for these great providers, might be a tad bit cheaper than these guys if you are looking into shared.

Locations available + CloudLinux limits :

Las Vegas ( BuyShared ) - 1 CPU 1 GB RAM, 20 EP, 100 Processes, 25 MB Disk I/O

Luxembourg ( BuyShared ) - 1 CPU 1 GB RAM, 20 EP, 100 Processes, 25 MB Disk I/O

Asia ( Hostmantis @ OVH ) 1 CPU 3 GB RAM, 30 EP, 100 Processes, 2 MB Disk I/O

UK ( MSPnick @ his basement ) - No cloudlinux, that pleb

Atlanta & Netherlands ( Ramnode ) - 1 CPU 1 GB RAM, 20 EP, 100 Processes, 40 MB Disk I/O


PM me for the IPs or anything!

Thanks for reading !
